name: Tilt (Vertical Rotation)
description: Vertical camera rotation on fixed axis, revealing height or following vertical action

prompt.base: Tilting camera movement, vertical rotation, camera moving up or down, fixed axis rotation, revealing vertical space, tilt up or tilt down, following vertical action, smooth tilt
prompt.positive: tilting shot, vertical camera movement, smooth rotation, upward tilt, downward tilt, vertical reveal, following vertical action, tilt up, tilt down, smooth vertical sweep
prompt.negative: static camera, horizontal movement, panning, tracking, dolly movement, no camera movement, fixed frame

technical.speed: Slow to medium for smooth reveal
technical.use_cases: Revealing tall structures, character reveals, showing scale vertically

examples: Camera tilting up a skyscraper, revealing its full height, smooth vertical movement
Tilting down from sky to ground level, vertical reveal of the scene, smooth downward motion
